Name: Sandream
About the game: Ella's memory is blurred in the world of sand. She faced many difficulties alone, and with the help of many friends, she bravely moved forward, constantly collected memory fragments to find herself, and faced challenges such as pain, depression, and war one by one, and finally grow up bravely. Thank you very much for your tolerance and support for our nameless team, and thank you for your warm suggestions and feedback. Although there are still many problems in the game, your support and encouragement make us feel that our persistence has great momentum. This is a sand painting style game, which gradually shows Ella's journey of growth and transformation. It needs to constantly explore and collect, finally achieve the wish after collecting all the memories. The game shows Ella's dream. In the plot, Ella gradually looks for all the memory fragments in the dream and recalls all the past events. And with the help of everyone, she gradually grows up and continues to overcome all kinds of hardships. We want to call everyone to resist the war and pain, and hope for good things by this game. we wish we can do some right things by this game. We are BluSped Game Studio, engaged in indie game development. This is our new game. We hope you like it. and hope everyone can care about and help more peoples in pain. If you have any questions or suggestions please mail to us or Twitter us.
